---
category: news
title: "Noisy and quiet environments impact speech recognition in people with mild dementia"
excerpt: "Listening to the spoken word in noisy environments is challenging for everyone. Acoustic studies show people with mild dementia struggle to understand speech in both noisy and quiet environments, highlighting the need for everyone to communicate clearly."
